detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract FintechGreen (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#225-227) has payable functions:
	 - CommonToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#219-221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [FintechGreen](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#L225-L227) has payable functions:
	 - [CommonToken.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FintechGreen.sol#L219-L221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
